      EuchreGame()

    • Method Detail

      • dealerCard

        public boolean dealerCard(int index)
        This method asks the player of the given index whether or not they want the dealer to pick up the top card of the discard pile.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the player to ask.
        Returns:
        True if they want the dealer to pick the card up, false if not.

      • chooseTrump

        public boolean chooseTrump(int index)
        This method asks the player of the given index whether or not they want to choose the trump if the dealer card had not been chosen.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the player to ask.
        Returns:
        True if they chose a trump, false if not.

      • makePlay

        public void makePlay(int index)
        This method asks the player of the given index to play a card from their hand.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the player to ask.

      • checkWin

        public void checkWin()
        This method checks the four cards on the table to determine which player won the round. It then updates the point totals for the round.

      • deal

        public void deal()
        Deals the cards.
